product_name: Planet Bike ATB Fender Set - Clip On - Mountain
long_description: These all-terrain ATB clip-on fenders from Planet Bike are easy to install and remove, depending on the riding season. Constructed of robust, all-weather polymer material. Includes hardware for most bikes and clips on and off in seconds. Set includes front and rear fenders.
short_description: These all-terrain ATB clip-on fenders from Planet Bike are easy to install and remove, depending on the riding season.
